title: LFM to start a rank team plat+ fill the requirements
body:
This is an update on the 12th day on this post id still like to scout to make a bigger team and to have more people but trailing now is a lot harder to make the cut due to so much skilled players have joined and have even made me consider testing us in scrims and tournaments the team is heading in the path that i wanted it to be and all the guys have put weight on themselves to help out by being prepared and even adding new memebers but we are forming a main squad but trails will still run but if the requirements arent filled and im not satisfied with your profile outlook then i cant waste time on tryouts due to the team being so active so keep this in mind if i dont respond stright away and make sure u fill a comment and be nice if u make it toma tryout because i might not be the only one testing people anymore

Read the list below dont add me straight away leave a comment with this list of reqirements filled id like to understand u a bit before adding u on league

Ing
Solo que rank
Do u have discord 
How often do u play 
What role do u main
What champs do u main
Would u consider that u have adopted the meta right now
Have u had experience in a team before and how long
Are u toxic
What would u consider a bad score or game for u
Op.gg list your 3 best kda 
Also leave a reason y u have decided to search for a team

replies.body:
Ign: Truerepentance
Solo que rank: Plat 5
Do u have discord: No. would get it if required
How often do u play: Most afternoons and nights when i'm not working
What role do u main: ADC/SUP
What champs do u main: Jhin, Jinx, Cait, Tank Supports, Morgana
Would u consider that u have adopted the meta right now: Yes
Have u had experience in a team before and how long: Several teams where after a few weeks no one played anymore...
Are u toxic: No
What would u consider a bad score or game for u: More deaths than kills
Op.gg list your 3 best kda: Jinx 3.18, Jhin 3.12, Cait 2.11
Also leave a reason y u have decided to search for a team: Always have more fun interacting with a team than playing solo q.
Love to try u out just accept my request and ill get started with a trial asap

Summoner Name: Akeno Himejima
Solo queue rank: Platinum 4
Do u have discord: Yes
How often do u play: 5/7 days
What role do u main: Support
What champs do u main: Sona, Blitz, Alistar
Would u consider that u have adopted the meta right now: Somewhat most of it, need to learn more though.
Have u had experience in a team before and how long: Yes, I use to manage teams on CG and played in them.
Are u toxic: I'm a batrachotoxin
What would u consider a bad score or game for u: Depending on the situations and how the game goes, so if we are losing and I lack wards, then that. If we are ahead but I still manage to feed or let people die often.
Op.gg list your 3 best kda: http://prntscr.com/b4868e
Also leave a reason y u have decided to search for a team: Want to get back into teams.

Im sorry to say but support has been filled and there is a sub as well plus your champ pool isnt exactly meta and needs more branching of champs as it is one of the most versatile roles sorry man ill hit u up when we lose our sub

Ing - R0ADT0DIAM0ND
Solo que rank -  Mid Plat 5
Do u have discord -  No but can get it
How often do u play - Daily
What role do u main - Jg/Adc
What champs do u main - Vayne, Maokai, Yi
Would u consider that u have adopted the meta right now - Yes
Have u had experience in a team before and how long - Yes and for a few months
Are u toxic - Try not to be
What would u consider a bad score or game for u - 10/10/2
Op.gg list your 3 best kda - Vayne - 2.31:1
Yi - 2.58:1
Ezreal - 3.22:1
Also leave a reason y u have decided to search for a team - Been a while since i have been with a team and thought i would give it a go again.
Hey man u can qualify for playing just give me a heads up when your on and i can test u out
Im on usually after 4pm Sydney Time

Solo que rank-gold 1, last season plat
Do u have discord-no
How often do u play-daily 
What role do u main-adc mainbut  can jungle tho
What champs do u main-adc-sivir,ezreal,trist,vayne,jinx,lucian,jhin
jungle-graves,kindred
Would u consider that u have adopted the meta right now-yes
Have u had experience in a team before and how long-no
Are u toxic- nahh
What would u consider a bad score or game for u-1/5/0
Op.gg list your 3 best kda corki- 4.32:1
jhin-3:97:1
lucian:3:16
Also leave a reason y u have decided to search for a team- i wanna work with a team ;D
I can consider u but due to rank u have to be plat once that is filled then i can invite u

ign: obamaatemychickn
Solo que rank-    plat soon
Do u have discord-    no can get
How often do u play-    daily
What role do u main-    jungle
What champs do u main-    nidalee, lee
Would u consider that u have adopted the meta right now-   cant play kindred or graves atm can learn
Have u had experience in a team before and how long- yeah just casual tho
Are u toxic-     nahhh
What would u consider a bad score or game for u-    below 5 kills above 7 deaths under 8 assists
Op.gg list your 3 best kda
Also leave a reason y u have decided to search for a team- solo que is boredom
